item.title: Tutorial on Probabilistic Programming
item.description: On Thursday 2019-02-28 from 10 am to 11 am, Prof. Daniel Ritchie gave a tutorial on probabilistic programming in the 11th lecture hall at ICERM. The slides are available online. A blog post with a summary would be available later.
